column2: ?       We are seeking a highly detail-oriented and analytical Manager to lead Life Insurance s Business Category Operations. Candidate is required to manage a team that tracks business parameters and reports any anomalies or errors detected in the ecosystem both internally and externally. The role requires to own the end-to-end process of identifying errors in minimum possible time, highlighting to the respective stakeholders, analyzing the errors, identifying their root causes, and providing insights on issue fixes in real-time as well as avoiding recurrence of the issues via structural fixes. The position requires managing internal and external stakeholders effectively and communicating findings and recommended solutions accurately. Role requires the candidates to build professional relationships with Insurers           The Role:               Lead a team of folks, responsible for AOP/sales and it s achievement     Identify root causes of errors and investigate their impact on business operations and sales     Analyze and provide data/,metric insights on issue fixes to reduce business loss to internal (Business, Tech, Product,etc.) as well as external stakeholders (Insurers)     Drive Issuance end-to-end with Insurers and enable right SOPs to track the same     Creation of monthly / weekly/daily reports to drive business decisions     Feed ingestion for daily transactions, weekly MIS updation, Stuck transactions clearance for smooth day-to-day operations     End-to-end management of Mandate calling, ingestion of data, renewal calling, settlement balance monitoring, negative balance monitoring     Collaborate with cross-functional teams to drive issue resolution and provide updates on issues and fixes to the leadership     Coordination with external partners and vendors to ensure a smooth flow of business     Responsible for defining, developing and communicating key metrics and business trends to partner and management team     Creation and maintenance of documentation related to processes, issues, and solutions     Grasping the underlying processes and data flows and should be able to analyze and work on the errors     Liaison with partner insurance for day to day business operations and act as a bridge between partner SPOCs and internal business, product tech team     Actively work to set up scalable processes and wherever possible strive to suggest automation and optimisation     Strategize outreach attempts for improved issuance and persistency/mandates for policies         Qualifying Criteria:                 Strong attention to detail, problem solving and analytical skills      Exceptional written and verbal communication skills to interact with ISPs     Ability to manage internal and external stakeholders effectively     Ability to lead a team by example     Advanced knowledge of Microsoft Excel,Docs,Google sheets     Basic knowledge of SQL      Bachelors 3 - 5 years of experience/ Masters 1 - 5 years of experience     Tier 2 Engineering/Graduation or MBA/Post-graduation College     Handled a team before      External stakeholder exposure     Preference - Digital Insurance/Fintech/BFSI/Payments Platform/Insurance Tech/Life Insurance              ?

column1: EIS digital insurance Trainers and freelancers
column2: As an EIS Digital Insurance Trainer or Freelancer, you will be responsible for imparting knowledge and expertise in digital insurance solutions powered by the EIS (InsuranceCoreSuite) platform     This role involves developing and delivering training programs, conducting workshops, and supporting insurance professionals in adopting and maximizing the use of EIS technology       Key Responsibilities:       Training Program Development:Design and develop comprehensive training programs focused on EIS digital insurance solutions     Create engaging and interactive learning materials, including presentations, documentation, and hands-on exercises     Delivery of Training:Conduct training sessions for insurance professionals, including agents, underwriters, and other stakeholders     Facilitate workshops and hands-on exercises to ensure participants grasp the practical aspects of using EIS technology     Customization of Training Content:Tailor training content to meet the specific needs and requirements of different clients and organizations     Work closely with clients to understand their unique workflows and challenges     EIS Platform Expertise:Stay updated on the latest features, updates, and capabilities of the EIS InsuranceCoreSuite platform     Provide in-depth knowledge and guidance on leveraging the full potential of EIS digital insurance solutions     Consultation and Support:Offer consultation services to clients on optimizing their use of EIS technology     Provide ongoing support to insurance professionals, addressing queries and troubleshooting issues related to the EIS platform     Feedback and Continuous Improvement:Gather feedback from training sessions and use it to improve training materials and delivery methods     Stay informed about industry best practices and incorporate them into training programs

column2: Hexaware is Hiring for Executive position ( Voice Process)  Job Title: Sales Executive  Location: [ Ghansoli ]   Job Description:  We are seeking a dynamic and results-oriented Sales Executive to join our team at Hexaware. The Sales Executive will be responsible for promoting and selling insurance products to potential customers.   Responsibilities: Conducting outbound sales calls to prospective customers to promote insurance products. Understanding customer needs and providing appropriate insurance solutions. Building and maintaining relationships with clients to ensure repeat business. Meeting or exceeding sales targets and KPIs. Following up on leads generated through various channels. Providing excellent customer service to ensure customer satisfaction and retention. Keeping abreast of industry trends and competitor offerings. Collaborating with team members to achieve collective sales goals. Maintaining accurate records of sales activities and customer interactions.  Requirements: Proven experience in insurance sales. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills. Ability to work in a fast-paced and target-driven environment. Strong negotiation and closing skills. Self-motivated and results-oriented. Flexibility to work rotational shifts of 9 hours between 9 am to 9 pm. Minimum educational qualification: [HSC] Proven experience in insurance sales. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills. Ability to work in a fast-paced and target-driven environment. Strong negotiation and closing skills. Self-motivated and results-oriented. Flexibility to work rotational shifts of 9 hours between 9 am to 9 pm. Minimum educational qualification: [Specify if any]. Relevant certifications/licenses may be preferred.     Benefits: Competitive salary range of 14k to 22k in hand plus incentives. Opportunities for career growth and advancement. Comprehensive training and support. Employee benefits package. Dynamic and supportive work environment.     If you meet the above requirements and are passionate about sales, we encourage you to apply for this exciting opportunity at Hexaware. Join us in making a difference in the insurance industry.

column2: Role Details:  Department: Marketing  Employment Type:  Full Time Role in a Nutshell:  Elevate narratives to make life insurance approachable and relatable, transforming product features into stories that highlight the significance of financial security, deepening audience connections, fostering trust, and showcasing Bandhan Life as a trusted ally in their pursuit of a secure future. Key Responsibilities:   Lead the creation and timely execution of product-focused marketing assets, aligning closely with the brand's identity and objectives.   Oversee a portfolio of projects, prioritizing a cohesive brand narrative across platforms, enhancing product visibility and consumer connection.   Harness agency capabilities and in-house design tools to produce engaging, market-driven content.   Dive into market trends and customer feedback, leveraging insights to steer product marketing toward success.   Champion collaboration across teams, and with external partners to ensure seamless delivery and effectiveness of marketing initiatives.   Masterfully manage time to meet tight deadlines and marketing milestones while keeping a sharp eye on quality deliverables.   Direct clear, constructive communication with all stakeholders, syncing on goals and progress.  Qualifications & Competencies: 3-5 years of experience in product marketing. Bachelor's Degree in Marketing, Business Administration, or a related field; an MBA is a bonus.  Demonstrated ability to manage multiple projects with tight timelines.   Flair to draft sharp, visually appealing, effective communications with an eye to detail. ??Proficiency in design tools  (like Canva) is a plus.  Strong stakeholder management skills. Outstanding verbal and written communication. Self-starter with a strong propensity for collaboration We don't set a minimum experience requirement - talent, passion, and drive are what count

column2: Role Details: Department:  Attachment Employment Type:  Full Time Locations: Mumbai, Delhi, Chennai Role Summary:  We are seeking a highly motivated and results-driven Strategic Partner Account Manager to join our dynamic team. As a key player in our organization, you will be responsible for driving revenue growth, fostering strong partner relationships, and ensuring service excellence. If you're a proactive leader with a passion for exceeding targets and delivering exceptional customer experiences, we want to hear from you. Key Responsibilities: 1. Revenue Achievement: Consistently achieve revenue targets as per Annual Operating Plan (AOP) by cultivating and managing relationships within partnerships. 2. Partner Relationship & Engagement: Develop and maintain multiple-level connections within partner organizations and our company to ensure continuous engagement. Drive cross-selling initiatives to ensure partners sell multiple products from our portfolio. 3. Partner Satisfaction & Service Excellence: Act as the Single Point of Contact (SPOC) for partners, ensuring they receive best-in-class experiences in terms of logins, issuance, and issue resolutions. 4. Strong Business Development Pipeline: Build and maintain a robust sales pipeline for Business-to-Business (B2B) deals within the vertical. 5. Collaborative Approach: Collaborate effectively with Customer Service, Underwriting, Operations, IT, and Product teams to ensure seamless delivery of services to partners.  6. Market Feedback and Strategic Input: Gather and provide regular market and environmental feedback to inform strategic decision-making. Qualifications & Competencies:  1. Bachelors degree in business administration, Marketing, or related field (MBA preferred) with 4-7 years relevant experience (preferably from insurance domain) 2. Proven track record of exceeding revenue targets and driving business growth in a similar role. 3. Strong understanding of partnership dynamics and experience managing partner relationships. 4. Excellent communication, negotiation, and interpersonal skills. 5. Ability to collaborate effectively across teams and influence stakeholders at all levels. Analytical mindset with the ability to leverage data to drive decision-making

column2: Job description Key Responsibilities: Strategic Planning: Develop and implement a comprehensive sales strategy for the defence sector aligned with overall organizational objectives. Identify key market trends, opportunities, and potential threats to inform strategic decision-making. Business Development: Cultivate and expand relationships with defense agencies, government entities, and military contractors. Lead the identification and pursuit of new business opportunities, including tenders and contracts. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to develop tailored solutions for defense clients. Team Leadership: Recruit, train, and manage a high-performing sales team focused on the defence sector. Provide leadership, guidance, and mentorship to ensure the team meets or exceeds sales targets. Conduct regular performance reviews and implement development plans for team members. Client Relationship Management: Build and maintain strong relationships with key decision-makers in defense organizations. Understand client needs, expectations, and challenges to tailor solutions and enhance client satisfaction. Address client concerns and inquiries promptly to maintain positive relationships. Sales Forecasting and Reporting: Develop accurate sales forecasts based on market analysis, sales trends, and pipeline assessments. Prepare regular reports for senior management, highlighting key performance metrics, achievements, and challenges. Utilize CRM tools to track and manage sales activities, opportunities, and client interactions. Compliance and Contract Management: Ensure compliance with regulations and standards relevant to the defence industry. Collaborate with legal and contract management teams to negotiate and finalize contracts with clients. Market Intelligence: Stay abreast of industry developments, competitor activities, and emerging technologies in the defence sector. Provide insights and recommendations to senior management based on market intelligence. Role:   Insurance Sales / BD Manager Industry Type:   Insurance Department:   BFSI,   Investments & Trading Employment Type:   Full Time, Permanent Role Category:   Life Insurance EducationUG:   Any GraduatePG:   Any Postgraduate Location : Kochi/Cochin,Kottayam,Idukki *Additional Hindi Language is very must* Key Skills Skills highlighted with  are preferred key skills   Interested Candidates can apply and send CV to Avila.selvaraj@pramericalife.in Contact Number : Avila HR - 9360048686

column2: Max Life Insurance Company Limited is looking for Relationship Associate - Bancassurance to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey        A Relationship Associate in Bancassurance is a role within the banking sector that focuses on building and maintaining relationships with customers in relation to insurance products and services offered by the bank      Bancassurance refers to the distribution of insurance products through banks, leveraging their existing customer base and distribution channels        Here are the key responsibilities of a Relationship Associate in Bancassurance:        Customer Relationship Management: Relationship Associates in Bancassurance establish and maintain strong relationships with bank customers      They engage with customers to understand their insurance needs, provide information about available insurance products, and offer personalized solutions based on individual requirements      Insurance Product Knowledge: They develop a comprehensive understanding of the insurance products offered by the bank      This includes life insurance, health insurance, general insurance, and other relevant insurance solutions      They stay updated on product features, benefits, terms, and conditions to effectively communicate the offerings to customers      Sales and Cross-Selling: Relationship Associates actively promote and sell insurance products to bank customers      They identify cross-selling opportunities by analyzing customer profiles and financial needs      They explain the features and benefits of insurance products, address customer queries, and guide customers through the insurance purchasing process      Needs Analysis and Solution Design: They conduct needs analysis for customers to determine their insurance requirements      They assess the customer's risk profile, financial goals, and coverage needs      Based on the analysis, they design suitable insurance solutions that align with the customer's preferences and financial capabilities      Documentation and Application Processing: Relationship Associates assist customers with the completion of insurance application forms and related documentation      They ensure accuracy and completeness of information provided by customers and facilitate the smooth processing of insurance applications      Customer Service and Support: They provide ongoing customer service and support to address inquiries, claims processing, and policy servicing requirements      They act as a point of contact for customers throughout the insurance policy lifecycle, resolving any issues or concerns that may arise
column11: insurance, team management, health insurance, customer service, business development, cross selling, sales, life insurance, claims processing, marketing, operations, motor insurance, relationship management, claims, bancassurance, general insurance, crm

customers to determine their insurance requirements     They assess the customer's risk profile, financial goals, and coverage needs     Based on the analysis, they design suitable insurance solutions that align with the customer's preferences and financial capabilities     Documentation and Application Processing: Relationship Associates assist customers with the completion of insurance application forms and related documentation     They ensure accuracy and completeness of information provided by customers and facilitate the smooth processing of insurance applications     Customer Service and Support: They provide ongoing customer service and support to address inquiries, claims processing, and policy servicing requirements     They act as a point of contact for customers throughout the insurance policy lifecycle, resolving any issues or concerns that may arise

column2: JOB POSITION- ARDM (ASSOCIATE RECRUITMENT & DEVELOPMENT MANAGER) Job description : Primarily responsible for management and development of channel network to promote Insurance and consequently accountable for revenue generation and achievement of business targets by recruiting & developing the team of advisors & generating business through them. An ARDM act as a Recruiter, coach & sales leader. Recruiter An RDM is responsible for Recruitment and development of quality advisors and encourage them for long term career. Recruit by selling career opportunity to such prospective advisors. To ensure that advisors undergo proper training on product, regulations and other selling inputs. Coach Monitoring the performance and daily activity of fast tracking of the advisors. Motivating their morale in order to retain the performing advisors and giving special attention to average performers and provide those need based training. Doing analysis of the need of the customer and ensuring high level of customer satisfaction leading to customer delight. Sales Leader Inculcate product as well as practical training to the advisors by accompanying them to client meetings and guiding, advising and motivating them on the sales funnel and achieving revenue targets. Carrying out various promotional activities for sales as well as for recruitment. Benefits: Enjoying the opportunity to help others achieve their full potential in a rewarding career. The ability to leverage skills through teaching and coaching other financial service professionals. A defined pathway into management. The opportunity to earn a very high income. Perks and benefits: Huge Incentives and Travelling allowance

column2: The Principal Officer serves as a key leader within the organization, responsible for overseeing and managing various aspects of operations, administration, and strategic initiatives. They work closely with senior management, board members, stakeholders, and staff to ensure the organization's goals and objectives are met effectively.        Key Responsibilities:          Strategic Leadership:       Develop and implement strategic plans in alignment with the organization's mission and objectives.    Provide visionary leadership to guide the organization towards its long-term goals.      Operations Management:       Oversee day-to-day operations to ensure efficiency, quality, and compliance with policies and regulations.    Identify areas for improvement and implement operational enhancements as needed.      Financial Management:       Manage budgeting, financial planning, and resource allocation to support organizational objectives.    Monitor financial performance and make recommendations for cost-saving measures or revenue generation.      Stakeholder Engagement:       Cultivate and maintain relationships with stakeholders including board members, donors, partners, and community members.    Represent the organization in external events, meetings, and collaborations.      Human Resources and Team Management:       Recruit, train, and supervise staff members, fostering a positive work environment and professional growth opportunities.    Ensure compliance with HR policies, regulations, and best practices.      Risk Management and Compliance:       Identify potential risks to the organization and develop strategies to mitigate them.    Ensure compliance with legal, regulatory, and contractual obligations.      Communication and Reporting:       Communicate effectively with internal and external stakeholders through various channels including reports, presentations, and meetings.    Provide regular updates to the board of directors and senior management on organizational performance and key initiatives.
column11: Principal

column2: EY, GDS Consulting is actively seeking seasoned Actuarial professionals to join our # Financial Services  Senior - https://lnkd.in/g4MPAfUS Location - Noida, Bangalore, Trivandrum, Kochi, Pune, Kolkata  Work Experience - 1 year to 8 years  Required Skills: ????????XIS or/and Prophet expertise and experience ????????nowledge of US Life/Annuity products and regulations, Statutory reporting ????????aluation experience  ????????ood Actuarial exam progress (4+ exams) ????????xperience with Advance Excel /VBA/SQL/Python would be an added advantage ????????referably from a quantitative educational background (Engineering, Statistics, Math, Physics, Economics, Finance)    Role name and description - Life Actuarial (Senior) EY GDS Consulting Global Delivery Services is one of EY's greatest global assets  a network of service delivery centers that provide high-quality services at a competitive cost for all EYs client serving and enablement teams.? Every day, we combine our subject matter expertise with our technology and automation skills to develop new solutions that deliver greater value for EY. If you have a passion for enabling world class actuarial services globally to solve the most complex challenges in the financial services industry, come join our dynamic GDS team! We are looking for a Senior Consultant in our Business Consulting Practice for Life Actuarial domain The opportunity We are looking for Senior Consultants within the Life Actuarial team delivering actuarial solutions and working closely with Senior Manager or Client partners in EYs global network of insurance sector and risk consulting professionals. ? Our clients are large multinationals, conglomerate groups and domestic insurers within the Life insurance sector. The team delivers sustainable benefits to our clients though enhancing business decisions using improved and effective applications of core Actuarial principals, methodologies within applicable standard practice.?   Our growing team of professionals come from a diverse background, all committed to being long term trusted advisors to our clients. ?This role will offer exposure into diverse fields comprising assets and liabilities within life actuarial domain Your key responsibilities As a Senior Consultant, you will: Responsible for delivering high quality results and generating effective and impactful solutions Provide focused solutions and training to Staff members Be responsible for ensuring all engagement are delivered within time Deliver engagements in line with our values and commitment to quality, consistently driving projects to completion and ensuring that work is of high standard ?? We are looking for individuals who have a proactive attitude and are seeking the opportunity for personal and professional growth, leveraging and supporting our global network Skills and attributes for success Good analytical skills Ability to do investigations in models / reporting process and independently solve problems Willingness to learn and apply learning actively in project work Self-motivation and proactiveness in driving project Willingness to travel to meet and work with clients (Desirable) Strong technical skills, proficient in GGY AXIS, Python, VBA, Power BI To qualify for the role, you must have Experienced resource  preferably 1-8 years Experienced in the following topics: Actuarial reserving, Assumption setting, Knowledge on Long Term Care (LTC) Products, Family of Universal Life Products including Secondary Guarantee, Family of Annuities (Deferred Annuity, Fixed Index Annuity and Variable Annuity)? Ideally, youll also have Preferred Actuarial Degree Strong academic background with a bachelor?? degree ideally business, actuarial or finance related supplemented ideally with a professional qualification Overseas exposure (especially US market experience) on products and local GAAP   What we look for? Good communication skills English fluent in speaking Good English writing skills Experience of leading/supporting teams to high quality timely delivery, actively building industry relationships and promoting a collaborative culture when working with colleagues
column11: Actuarial, Prophet, GGY AXIS, Modeling
